Returns: true if the action view was expanded, false otherwise.
expandActionView(android.view.MenuItem).Description: Use @B_android#view#MenuItem#expandActionView_E@ directly. Expand the action view associated with this menu item. The menu item must have an action view set, as well as the showAsAction flag @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#SHOW_AS_ACTION_COLLAPSE_ACTION_VIEW_E@. If a listener has been set using @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#setOnActionExpandListener_E@ it will have its @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#OnActionExpandListener#onMenuItemActionExpand_E@ method invoked. The listener may return false from this method to prevent expanding the action view.

getContentDescription(android.view.MenuI.Description: Retrieve the content description associated with this menu item.

Parameters: int: - How the item should display.

If the given item is compatible, this will call the item's supported implementation of @B_android#view#MenuItem#setShowAsAction_E@.

Returns: the tint applied to the item's icon
Modifier associated with the numeric shortcut.

The modifier is a combination of @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_META_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_CTRL_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_ALT_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_SHIFT_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_SYM_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_FUNCTION_ON_E@. The modifier is a combination of @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_META_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_CTRL_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_ALT_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_SHIFT_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_SYM_ON_E@, @B_android#view#KeyEvent#META_FUNCTION_ON_E@. Parameters: int: Layout resource to use for presenting this item to the user.
setActionView(android.view.MenuItem, int.Description: Use @B_android#view#MenuItem#setActionView_E@ directly. Set an action view for this menu item. An action view will be displayed in place of an automatically generated menu item element in the UI when this item is shown as an action within a parent. @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#setActionProvider_E@.

getActionView(android.view.MenuItem).Description: Use @B_android#view#MenuItem#getActionView_E@ directly. Returns the currently set action view for this menu item.

Returns: true if the item's action view is expanded, false otherwise.

getTooltipText(android.view.MenuItem).Description: Retrieve the tooltip text associated with this menu item.

Returns: true if the action view was collapsed, false otherwise.

The menu item must have an action view set, as well as the showAsAction flag @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#SHOW_AS_ACTION_COLLAPSE_ACTION_VIEW_E@. If a listener has been set using @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#setOnActionExpandListener_E@ it will have its @B_android#support#v4#view#MenuItemCompat#OnActionExpandListener#onMenuItemActionCollapse_E@ method invoked. The listener may return false from this method to prevent collapsing the action view.

Returns: the blending mode used to apply the tint to the item's icon

ClassDesc: Helper for accessing features in https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuItem_E@. static methods that correspond to the methods in https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuItem_E@, but take a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#MenuItem_E@ object as an additional argument.
